descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/hracWgh.png[/img][/center]

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Description:[/size][/color]
This mod provides eight variants of simple chainmail hauberk armor compiled with elements like plates, lamellar and pauldrons. 
It's obviously a heavy armor, it's craftable at any forge and can be improved. It's found under the "steel" section. (light leather lamellar is obviously found under "leather" section)
 
 
[color=#ff0000][size=3]Known Issues:[/size][/color]
[list][*]Some minor skin issues wich I'm unable to get rid of[/list] 
 
 
[color=#00ff00][size=3]Credits:[/size][/color]
[list][*]CREDO team for their awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49133/?]Medieval Skyrim Overhaul[/url] and personaly to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5142762]Witcher5688[/url] for permission to use some of the armor elements.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/39159]Mr.Dave[/url] for his awesome chainmail [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2324/?]texture[/url][/list] 
 
 
[color=#1e84cc][size=3]My other mod:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55116/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/qRw0TSa.png[/img]

[/url][b][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=3]To look like a knight - it's boring and dull
Serve in infantry - that's what means to be cool!!
Instead of being gallant in shiny white armor,
Smash 'em with halberd! Be a warrior brother![/size][/color][/font][/center][/b]
author: VAultMaN30

files.name: Simple Hauberk v1.15
files.changelogHtml:
Tunic skirt and taken from CREDO's resourses is replaced with new mesh with own textures.
Leggings, also taken from CREDO's resourses is replaced with retextured vanila miner pants.
Minor fixes to weight sliders.

files.name: Simple Hauberk v1.15 no-bracers

files.name: Simple Hauberk v1.20
files.changelogHtml:
- 2 new armor variants added
- tunic skirt mesh replaced
- minor fixes to all meshes (female neck no longel floats above the armor collar)
